x-frame-options.title: X-Frame-Options
x-frame-options.description: X-Frame-Options indicates to browser if the website can be framed or not. It protect against clickjacking attacks

x-content-type-options.title: X-Content-Type-Options
x-content-type-options.description: Indicates to browser to doens't mime-sniff the content-type of the response and uses wich the server sent

x-xss-protection.title: X-XSS-Protection
x-xss-protection.description: This header enable the XSS Reflected filter in the browsers. It can block, sanitize or interprete the response

referrer-policy.title: Referrer-Policy
referrer-policy.description: Sets which information will be sent in Referer header

x-download-options.title: X-Download-Options
x-download-options.description: In IE it prevents downloaded files to be directly opened in the browser forcing user to save it and them open in any application.

x-permitted-cross-domain-policies.title: X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies
x-permitted-cross-domain-policies.description: Apply a policy to some clients (mainly Adobe products, as flash player) to access or not a content
